mapper.select:
select p.*,i.id as pid,i.PRODUCT_ID as PProductId,i.LIMITED_PRICE as plimitedPrice, i.PURCHASE_COUNT as ppurchaseCount,i.PROJECT_ID as pprojectId,i.CREATED_AT as pcreatedAt, i.UPDATED_AT as pupdatedAt,i.REMARK as prmark, i.CREATER_ID as pcreaterId from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT p LEFT JOIN T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT_INFO i on p.id=i.PROJECT_ID where p.CREATER_ID = #{uid}
and p.NAME like '%${name}%'
and p.START_TIME= #{startTime},
ORDER BY p.CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.sql: ID, NAME, DELIVERY_DEADLINE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS, TRADED_SUPPLIER_COUNT, TRANSPORT_FEES, DEMAND_UNIT, CONTACT_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, CONTENT , ATTACHMENT_ID, REMARK, STATUS, CREATER_ID, FORM_ID, TURNOVER_RATION, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, ORG_ID,ORG_CONTACT_TEL,ORG_CONTACT_NAME,CONTACT_TEL
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_BSS_OB_PROJECT (ID, NAME, DELIVERY_DEADLINE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS, TRADED_SUPPLIER_COUNT, TRANSPORT_FEES, DEMAND_UNIT, CONTACT_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, CONTENT , ATTACHMENT_ID, REMARK, STATUS, CREATER_ID, FORM_ID, TURNOVER_RATION, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT,ORG_ID,ORG_CONTACT_TEL,ORG_CONTACT_NAME,CONTACT_TEL) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryDeadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradedSupplierCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transportFees,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{demandUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{turnoverRation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orgContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select
from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT where 1=1
and name= ${name}
order by CREATED_AT DESC

select
from T_BSS_OB_PROJECT where STATUS!=0 and STATUS !=4 and STATUS!=3 order by CREATED_AT DESC

mapper.update:
update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_DEADLINE = #{record.deliveryDeadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELIVERY_ADDRESS = #{record.deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADED_SUPPLIER_COUNT = #{record.tradedSupplierCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRANSPORT_FEES = #{record.transportFees,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEMAND_UNIT = #{record.demandUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONTENT = #{record.content ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT_ID = #{record.attachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORM_ID = #{record.formId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TURNOVER_RATION = #{record.turnoverRation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERY_DEADLINE = #{record.deliveryDeadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELIVERY_ADDRESS = #{record.deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADED_SUPPLIER_COUNT = #{record.tradedSupplierCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRANSPORT_FEES = #{record.transportFees,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEMAND_UNIT = #{record.demandUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONTENT = #{record.content ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTACHMENT_ID = #{record.attachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORM_ID = #{record.formId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TURNOVER_RATION = #{record.turnoverRation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_DEADLINE = #{deliveryDeadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELIVERY_ADDRESS = #{deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADED_SUPPLIER_COUNT = #{tradedSupplierCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRANSPORT_FEES = #{transportFees,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEMAND_UNIT = #{demandUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONTENT = #{content ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT_ID = #{attachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORM_ID = #{formId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TURNOVER_RATION = #{turnoverRation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_OB_PROJECT set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERY_DEADLINE = #{deliveryDeadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELIVERY_ADDRESS = #{deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADED_SUPPLIER_COUNT = #{tradedSupplierCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRANSPORT_FEES = #{transportFees,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEMAND_UNIT = #{demandUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONTENT = #{content ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTACHMENT_ID = #{attachmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORM_ID = #{formId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TURNOVER_RATION = #{turnoverRation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
